attributes.action: Stop income tax deduction from 'Old AgePensions'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the deduction of income tax from the 'Old Age Pension'. Having paid tax on salaries earned during ones working life and on seperate pensions, it is now necessary for some elderly people to gain employment, just to 'make ends meet'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
